name: The Tower (itch) (Dissident Studio)
description:
Introduction

You are trapped in a strange tower, and it's collapsing.
Find a way down to escape the tower.

Installation

Simply unzip the archive and open "The Tower.exe"

Inputs Gamepad

Left Stick : Move
Right Stick : Look Around
LT/L2 : Run
A/X : Jump
X/Square : Interact

Keyboard & Mouse

ZQSD/WASD : Move
Mouse : Look Around
Shift : Run
Space : Jump
E : Interact
